participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and warm-hearted, Emily finds joy in music and sweet treats. She's nurturing and dreams of a family.
participant_1.background: I am from Georgia. I can play the violin. I love chocolate. I want to have two kids. I cannot sing very well.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous yet introverted, Jordan enjoys exploring new places but feels uneasy in social situations.
participant_2.background: Formal situations make me uncomfortable. I have over 4000 friends on Facebook. I live alone. I enjoy hitchhiking. I have not spoken to my family in years.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking, camping, and traveling.
That sounds fun! I like to play the violin, and I love chocolate.
I don't really play any instruments, but I do love chocolate.
What's your favorite thing about chocolate?
I love the way it tastes, and I love how it makes me feel.
Me too! I think chocolate is the best thing ever.
I agree! What's your favorite kind of chocolate?
I like dark chocolate the best.
Me too! I like the way it's rich and flavorful.
Me too! I love the way it melts in your mouth.
Me too! I love chocolate so much.
Me too! I think we'd be good friends.
